name: Pink Piano Tiles: Piano Games
description:
Girls favourite color is Pink. so we have develop special piano games for girls.
Pink Piano tap games for girls

Piano tap games is specially for New Years 2017. Free play and enjoy real piano tap games.
The Original, Famous and Wonderful Game-Piano tap!
This is a super fun and highly addictive game suited for everyone.
No special skills needed, all this game asks of you is an attentive mind and fast fingers!
Piano tap is 2017 best and free games.

Piano music and piano songs.

The perfect PIANO tap, new piano music play, not step on the white pieces! Follow the music click on the color, simple operation, rich gameplay! Can compete with a small partner, so you have a perfect music beyond imagination feast!


How To Play:-
Tap on the black tiles while listening to music. Avoid the white ones

Game features:
- multi color piano tap games
- multiple sound collections
- Color Piano tap have 10 levels
- Piano tap game is colorful game
- awesome sound available in piano tap.

Piano tap have most popular 4 levels:-

Classic piano tap : In classic mode you have to tap number of tap in minimum time period as fast as u can tap.

Arcade piano tap : In Arcade mode you have to tap on black tiles (Don't tap withe tiles) without missing any black tiles.

Zen piano tap : For Zen level you have to tap as fast as u can in limited time period.

Bomb piano tap : In Bomb level Don't tap on Bomb and white tiles, you have to identified bomb and forgot it without tap.
